channel.title: Buying Suggestion
channel.description: Post here your requirements, Our members will try to find your product at best deal

item.title: Smartphone Needed for Job Purpose ( Microsoft Office)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Legend)
item.dc:creator: Legend
item.content:encoded:
Dear all

Please suggest me a good smartphone under 20000/- which is for my job purpose (Microsoft Office).

Major Concerns are below mentioned
- Battery
- camera
- Ease of use
- Ringtone Volume
- Rough Use

Please suggest me to buy a good one
Good suggestions are appreciated

My requirements
> I dont need a smart tv but if it is its better

> 40 " min requirement
>Sound must be good

Thats it.

item.title: Look gorgeous with latest Indian designer Kurtis this year 2017

item.content:encoded:
Fashion among Indian women is all about Indian ethnicity with western touch. Nowadays, Indian girls clothing style is an influential revolution in Indian traditional. And we can't deny giving the major credit to ever stylish ethnic wear 'Kurti'. These days, there are exceptional varieties available in Kurtis in the market with fabulous patterns and prints in all bright and light colors for all age categories from a teenage girl to an...

item.title: Trend of Indian Designer Salwar Suits

item.content:encoded:
The Salwar Suit is one of the most popular clothes for millions of women in Asian territory. Designer Salwar Suits look elegant for a wedding ceremony or even for casual family gatherings. This outfit has adapted for all occasions as casual or formal because of its availability in diverse fabric, color, and embroidery options. The designer Salwar Kameez is fast becoming...

item.title: Need some suggestion regarding dell vostro 1014 motherboard
item.author: invalid@example.com (VJK)
item.dc:creator: VJK
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys i need some advice..
My motherboard is giving me problem auto shutoff....screen getting distorted...cant use my battery...white screen problem...3.5 mm jack issue

so my question is does replacing motherboard will solve the issue..

I am getting motherboard in between 3000-5000 on aliexpress website and 4500 on ebay.in...i know they are not new but i dont have any choice..


Suggest me guys doesn changing motherboard will solve the issue or not...

item.title: please suggest smartphone under rs 9000
item.author: invalid@example.com (priyavratkmr)
item.dc:creator: priyavratkmr
item.content:encoded:
i want to buy a smartphone under rs 10000
it should meet following criteria
3g, WiFi, 1gb ram, minimum 4gb internal memory, smooth touch, very nice display
and most important, it should be durable and after-sale service should be good
please suggest some good smartphone

I searched a lot on Google and after reading reviews from many peoples, I ended up with two result i.e. micromax canvas juice or micromax canvas android one

please give your suggestion friends
Thank you!
